```py
pandas.pivot_table(data, 
                  values=None, 
                  index=None, 
                  columns=None, 
                  aggfunc='mean', 
                  fill_value=None, 
                  margins=False, 
                  dropna=True, 
                  margins_name='All', 
                  observed=False, 
                  sort=True)
```

```py
pd.pivot_table(data, 
               index = 'market', 
               columns = ['status','year'], 
               values = 'room_price',
               aggfunc = 'mean',
               fill_value=0).head()
```

```py
pd.pivot_table(data, 
               index = 'market', 
               columns = 'status', 
               values = ['nights','month'],
               aggfunc = 'mean',
               fill_value=0).head()
```

```py
pd.pivot_table(data, 
               index = 'market', 
               columns = 'status',  
               values = 'guests',
               aggfunc = ['mean','max'],
               fill_value=0).head()
```

```py
pd.pivot_table(data, 
               index = 'market', 
               columns = ['status','year'], 
               values = ['lead_time','nights'],
               aggfunc = ['median','max'],
               fill_value=0)
```

```py
df['area_code'] = pd.Categorical(
                        df['area_code'], 
                        categories=['1111', 
                                    '1112', 
                                    '1113'])
df['agent'] = pd.Categorical(
                        df['agent'], 
                        categories=['a', 'b', 'c'])
```

```py
pd.pivot_table(df,
              index = 'area_code',
              columns = 'agent',
              values = 'price',
              aggfunc = 'mean',
              dropna = False)
```

```py
pd.pivot_table(df,
              index = 'area_code',
              columns = 'agent',
              values = 'price',
              aggfunc = 'sum',
              dropna = False,
              fill_value = 0,
              margins = True)
```
